comment._content:
Suffragette gathering in NYC to publicize Suffragette Ball and Dance Exhibition at Armory, on January 31, 1914.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Pixel Wrangler & Wystan:  Thanks for the additional information.  We'll add the correct name and event next time we update.
